sourceMeaningMnemonic: Your <radical>mouth</radical> contains a <radical>scroll</radical>, which you pull out and look at. On the scroll is a map, showing the <kanji>range</kanji> of the <kanji>sphere</kanji> of your mouth.
meaningInfo: On the map, there is a circle drawn around your mouth showing what range your mouth exists in. Thankfully, your tongue and teeth are within that sphere.
readingMnemonic: Looking at the <kanji>range</kanji> of your mouth on the map, you notice a tiny samurai marked near your molars. It is <reading>Ken</reading> (<ja>けん</ja>) the samurai.
readingInfo: Everything else on the map was accurate, so you take a close look in the mirror, and there he is: a tiny Ken the samurai, protecting the range that is your mouth. He gives you a small nod and goes back to his post.
